attributes.action: Allow Milo Yiannopoulos to pubicliy exercise free speech in his home country.
attributes.background:
After hearing that Milo was disallowed from speaking at his former school, I knew something had to be done. 

This man has done nothing but speak truth in his political endeavours, yet the PC- 'triggered' brigade have won in their quest to stifle and quell Milos truth spreading.

rejection.details: This decision was taken by the school, not by the UK Government or Parliament.
